hibernate-mapping.query: select count(*) from Sponsor
from Sponsor order by name
from Sponsor as Sponsor where Sponsor.name = ?
from Sponsor order by name asc
from Sponsor order by name desc
select count(*) from Sponsor where sponsorFirstChar = ?
from Sponsor where sponsorFirstChar = :sponsorFirstChar order by name desc
from Sponsor where sponsorFirstChar = :sponsorFirstChar order by name asc
select count(*) from Sponsor where sponsorFirstChar between :firstChar and :secondChar
from Sponsor where sponsorFirstChar between :firstChar and :secondChar order by name asc
from Sponsor where sponsorFirstChar between :firstChar and :secondChar order by name desc
